articles.title: Stock futures rise slightly after a rollercoaster week - CNBC
articles.description: Investors are monitoring if corporate America will have any significant downward revisions to their outlooks.
articles.content:
Stock futures edged higher in overnight trading Sunday as investors awaited big earnings reports to roll in.

articles.title: Business Council of Canada says Nexus closure 'deeply troubling' in letter to U.S. - CP24
articles.description: Business Council of Canada CEO Goldy Hyder says it is ‘deeply troubling’ that the U.S. government has not reopened 13 Nexus enrolment centres, in a letter to David Cohen, the American ambassador to Canada, obtained by The Canadian Press.
articles.content:
The Business Council of Canada says it is concerned over the continued closure of the Nexus trusted-traveller program.

articles.title: Auger-Aliassime beats American J.J. Wolf in Firenze Open final for 2nd career title - CBC Sports
articles.description: Canada's Felix Auger-Aliassime defeated J.J. Wolf 6-4, 6-4 to win his second ATP Tour trophy at the Firenze Open on Sunday in Florence, Italy.
articles.content:
Canada's Felix Auger-Aliassime defeated J.J. Wolf 6-4, 6-4 to win his second ATP Tour trophy at the Firenze Open on Sunday in Florence, Italy.
